snippet.title: GlueFO 2.0
snippet.description: GlueFO 2.0 New edition of GlueFO, now with 3 game modes, 8 challenges, 42 awards and new upgrades!

snippet.title: GlueFO
snippet.description: GlueFO Collect the tiny orbs and use them to shoot at the big orbs until there are only tiny orbs left.

snippet.title: Gluey
snippet.description: Gluey Try to remove all the blobs from the screen. Group small blobs and remove them together.

snippet.title: GlueFO 3: Asteroid Wars
snippet.description: GlueFO 3: Asteroid Wars Split the asteroids, collect the coins and destroy the alien UFO's and bosses.

snippet.title: Gluey 2
snippet.description: Gluey 2 Physics puzzle game. Try to clear each level by removing all the gooey blobs from the playing field.
